<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-font-kerning:0pt">先不用说<span lang="EN-US">"</span>无论什么语言都是一种工具<span lang="EN-US">"</span>。工具是我们身体的一部分，解放军解放台湾靠<span lang="EN-US">"</span>小米加步枪<span lang="EN-US">"? "</span>工具无所谓<span lang="EN-US">"</span>论可以休矣。对于实际的软件工程工具和平台的选择是很重要的，有时候是致命的<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">1. perl</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"PingFang SC Regular";mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-font-kerning:0pt">是强大的<span lang="EN-US">, perl=shell+awk+sed+</span>一堆命令行工具。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-fareast-font-family:
"PingFang SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-font-kerning:
0pt"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";
mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:
"PingFang SC Regular";mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-fareast-font-family:
"PingFang SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-font-kerning:
0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";
mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:
"PingFang SC Regular";mso-font-kerning:0pt">但是反过来也一样<span lang="EN-US">shell+awk+sed+</span>一堆命令行工具可以替代<span lang="EN-US">perl.</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-fareast-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";
mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:
"PingFang SC Regular";mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">2. shell</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"PingFang SC Regular";mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-font-kerning:0pt">的简约，可读性比<span lang="EN-US">perl</span>好，工具之间通过命令行<span lang="EN-US">stdio</span>管道通信，任何一个小部分都可以拿出来测试和试验，程序维护<span lang="EN-US">/</span>修改很容易。学习曲线和积累方式比<span lang="EN-US">perl</span>更优。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">3. perl</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"PingFang SC Regular";mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:"PingFang SC Regular";mso-font-kerning:0pt">是跨平台的呀！<span lang="EN-US">java</span>，<span lang="EN-US">sysv</span>标准<span lang="EN-US">, posix</span>是跨平台工具和标准。<span lang="EN-US">oracle</span>还跨平台呢<span lang="EN-US">! </span>但是实际软件部署是需要选择平台的，一旦选择好了就希望这个平台稳定。虽然<span lang="EN-US">unix/linux</span>的命令行工具在不同的平台特性稍有不同，但是你一旦选定了平台，那么这个平台上的<span lang="EN-US">shell/</span>命令行工具就是非常稳定的可依赖集合，不但可靠而且基本不会有变化。软件开发商的投资也因此受到了保护。<span lang="EN-US">perl</span>和<span lang="EN-US">python</span>则处于不断的变化当中，新的数据库<span lang="EN-US">DBI</span>模块<span lang="EN-US">/</span>某种功能的版本来临，需要<span lang="EN-US">perl/python</span>升级到新的版本。那么新的版本是否可靠，是否影响原有系统的运行参数<span lang="EN-US">? </span>那么需要很多的回滚测试。<span lang="EN-US">perl</span>可以写文件到某个路径，<span lang="EN-US">win</span>下面用盘符开头，<span lang="EN-US">*nix</span>下面用<span lang="EN-US">/</span>路经开头<span lang="EN-US">---</span>软件开发和部署的成本并没有因为<span lang="EN-US">perl</span>跨平台而减少。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
